mapper.select: /* cetusDownloadsHist.getAllUserDownloadsHistList */ SELECT CDH.UID ,CDH.USER_UID ,CDH.TARGET_CD ,CASE WHEN CDH.TARGET_CD = 'CONTENTS' THEN '컨텐츠' WHEN CDH.TARGET_CD = 'USER' THEN '유저' END AS TARGET_NM ,CDH.TARGET_UID ,CDH.FILE_UID ,CF.FILE_ID AS FILE_ID ,CF.ORG_FILE_NM AS ORG_FILE_NM ,CF.FILE_URL AS FILE_URL ,CF.DOWN_CNT AS DOWN_CNT FROM CETUS_DOWNLOADS_HIST CDH INNER JOIN CETUS_FILE CF ON CF.FILE_UID = CDH.FILE_UID::BIGINT WHERE CDH.USER_UID = #{userUid} AND CF.SAVED = 'Y' AND CF.USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY CDH.REG_DT DESC
